properties.areaDesc: Vanderburgh, IN; Henderson, KY; Posey, IN; Union, KY
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 15 at 11:16AM CST until February 24 at 7:38PM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana...
Kentucky...Illinois...

Ohio River at Owensboro...Newburgh Dam...Evansville...Mount Vernon...
J.T. Myers Dam...Shawneetown and Golconda

.The Ohio River basin from Owensboro down to Golconda continue to rise.
All 7 of these points are expected to crest in the minor flood category
on Wednesday or Thursday of next week. The only exception is Shawneetown
which is forecast to just reach the moderate flood category on Tuesday.
They will start to fall slowly late in the week.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Ohio River at Mount Vernon.
* until Monday February 24.
* At  6:00 AM Saturday the stage was 40.9 feet.
* Flood Stage is 35.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 43.0 feet by
Thursday evening. The river will fall below flood stage Monday,
February 24th.
* Impact...At 45.0 Feet...Large portions of Point Township in Posey
county are flooded.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
